name: Mamma mia (Peter G. Bouillon)
description:
Winner of the MAGS competition for June 2019

Help a hungry customer get an ice cream!

It is said (with or without justification) that Germans crave for ice cream as soon as the sun is shining -- even when it is freezing and there is snow in the streets. This is the story of a hungry German that must battle

  • an Italian ice cream vendor,
  • a crazy helicopter mum
  • and outlandish machinery

to get his beloved cone.

Features DIY voice acting: If you want to hear what's being said, then read the captions aloud! 

Overall playing length: Around half an hour.
Native resolution: 800x600 (will scale to fit larger screens)
Language: English

Note: Contains Italian swearing; protective Italian parents might want to cover their children's ears eyes.
